plot_novels[source]

plot_novels(path:"path for embeddings", start:"start for section", end:"end for section", x:"x-ticks", y:"y-ticks")

Generates plots for embeddings in the folder

Parameters:

  • path : <path for embeddings>

  • start : int <start for section>

  • end : int <end for section>

  • x : int <x-ticks>

  • y : int <y-ticks>

corr_heatmaps[source]

corr_heatmaps(path:"path for embeddings", std:"standardize or not")

Generates correlation plots from normalized SSMs

Parameters:

  • path : <path for embeddings>

  • std : int <standardize or not>

  • path : <path for embeddings>
